Comment: "There was dirt all around the station. The flood water from the last rain is still yet to be cleaned and is messy

This station is the best. They have several pumps and the attendants are always respectful with a smile

Beware of touts and beggars at this station. Keep your valuables out of sight. The security at this station is almost non-existent and you are on your own at night

Daylight robbery. The attendants are insane, they won'y give me my change and I had to leave after wasting my time. Never will I nuy fuel here again

Brand new station. Clean everywhere. They even offered to clean my windscreen. I am quite impressed
